articles.author: Christian Edwards, Helen Regan, Michael Rios, Lauren Kent
articles.title: Barred from US-Russia talks on Ukraine, Europe scrambles for response with Paris summit - CNN
articles.description: Reeling from shocks delivered by the Trump administration last week, European leaders held emergency talks in Paris on Monday as US and Russian officials prepare to meet in Saudi Arabia to discuss ending the war in Ukraine – without European or Ukrainian invo…
